full_text: Knitted hat/beanie in DROPS BabyMerino. The piece is worked bottom up in rib. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #berryblazehat DROPS Design: Pattern bm-123 Yarn group A SIZES : S/M – L/XL Fits head-size: 54/56 – 58/60 cm YARN : DROPS BABY MERINO from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group A) 100-100 g colour 51, Bordeaux NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 2.5 MM: Length 40 cm. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 2.5 MM. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need an 80 cm circular needle. KNITTING TENSION : 26 stitches in width and 32 rows in height with stocking stitch on needle size 2.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
